headline: Cardinal Health (CAH) Valuation Check After Strong Revenue And Earnings Update
summary: Cardinal Health (CAH) is back on investors’ radar after fresh company data highlighted revenue of about US$234.3b and net income of roughly US$1.6b, prompting closer attention to its recent share performance. See our latest analysis for Cardinal Health. At a share price of US$211.23, Cardinal Health has seen steady momentum, with a 10.72% 90 day share price return and a 66.76% 1 year total shareholder return suggesting interest in the business has strengthened over both shorter and longer...
